title: Make web development awesome with visual diffing tools
description:
Visual diffs are a great way to check for regressions on web sites which
may be missed by unit tests. In this talk you'll learn how to run
end-to-end tests on your client and server web libraries using a tool
called dpxdt. I'll also show how you can combine it with web-based diff
tools like ""git webdiff"" to quickly and confidently iterate on web
tools.
